= Installation =

== Linux ==
=== Manual Installation ===
  # Download the framework package - framework.zip 
  # Unzip the package - created folder "framework"
  # Copy or move the framework folder to the web root folder
    * For Ubuntu Server, web root folder is <font color='#666666'> "/var/www" </font>, use "cp -r framework /var/www"

== JQuery Support ==

To have latest support on JQuery related UI component. You can download the latest versions and put them in /webroot/plugin folder and specify the path (or URL) in framework's config.ini file.
